class.name: CSGCylinder3D
class.description: This node allows you to create a cylinder (or cone) for use with the CSG system. [b]Note:[/b] CSG nodes are intended to be used for level prototyping. Creating CSG nodes has a significant CPU cost compared to creating a [MeshInstance3D] with a [PrimitiveMesh]. Moving a CSG node within another CSG node also has a significant CPU cost, so it should be avoided during gameplay.

The default material used to render the cylinder. This material is used by the top and bottom faces if their materials are not set.
The number of sides of the cylinder, the higher this number the more detail there will be in the cylinder.
If [code]true[/code] the normals of the cylinder are set to give a smooth effect making the cylinder seem rounded. If [code]false[/code] the cylinder will have a flat shaded look.
